document.body: Picking Cherry Blossoms - finale (m/f, i/r, n/c) by Black Demon ______________________________________________ Standard Disclaimer! This is a fictional story intended for Adults only! ______________________________________________ ************ *********** Note: The story below is a story in itself. However, it is also a direct continuation of the earlier stories entitled: Picking Cherry Blossoms I thru IV ************ *********** It had been about ten months since Marcus had dressed up to attend the Cherry Blossom pageant that had quite a few lovely beauties vying for the title of Cherry Blossom Queen. Each contestant had been paraded on stage at the start of the pageant, with each contestant introduced separately to have her spot parade down the walkway in the limelight. Marcus had contrived quite a demented plot, one that would be carried out over the next year, a plot that would certainly sate his lust for succulent Asian beauties. With all the beauties dressed in sleek elegant evening gowns and heels, Marcus had been glad that the spotlight on the stage and the surrounding audience area dimmed and thus the growing tent in the front of his pants would not be observed. With each contestant providing a beautiful smile as she walked upon the stage, the innocence of each succulent little beauty had given Marcus a throbbing boner. Had he been forced to make a choice, Marcus would have been dumbfound and unable to make such a decision that as to making a choice as to which one of the beauties that he'd like to bed most. With the prominent and honorary judges sitting in the front row, Marcus had left it all up to them, having decided that it was their job that they had been selected for. 'Yes, yer the prestigious judges selected to pick the purty princesses and of the course the lovely cherry blossom queen! Ya jist go ahead and pick the innocent little beauties for Marcus to 'rape and ruin'!' he had chuckled that night of the pageant. He remembered having to hold back his laughter that night, when he had mentally thought 'Cherry blossom beauties! Only the beauties ya chose ain't gonna be having their precious little cherries fer very long, at least not by the time next year's pageant comes around!' Now, many months later, Marcus smiled as he wanted to let each judge know that he or she had done and excellent job in selecting the princesses for the Cherry Blossom court. Yessiree .yas all went and done a real fine job as judges damn, four of four thus far.ya guys cant git any fuckn better than that .each and every purty princess that yas chose was cherry all right an Is can sure attest to that fact .cause theys all was cherry after I bustedem! he chuckled. Well, but before Is go out congratulate ya all on doing a real fine job, theres jist one little item remaining fer me to check on ..making sure that purty Cherry Blossom Queens ..still got her cherry in tact, heh, heh! Marcus thought of the delightful task that lay ahead. Is must agree .yas pick one purty little bitch to reign as the queen .and Is went and kept the best fer last! he mused. Well, lets jist hope that purty little bitch didnt go and spoil it all fer me by giving her cherry of that young punk! he thought. Serving as Cherry Blossom Queen for the year had opened so many doors for her future and she really had enjoyed meeting with all the people along with the many events held in her honor or handling those duties expected of her. Most of all was her understanding boyfriend Mark, now her fiancé, after having just proposed to her on their dinner date the past weekend as her reign was coming to an end. Going together for two years after meeting at a dance in which Marks fraternity had invited her sorority, they had eyes for only one another after that first dance together. It was a forgone conclusion to all Marks frat brothers and her sorority sisters that they would marry once their college graduation came. In fact, Mark had proposed to her and she did say yes but wanted to wait till graduation got closer so as not to upset her very conservative parents who believed in graduation first before anything else. Even Mark had taken her ring shopping at it was all picked up and sized, a top of the line solitaire diamond over a carat, just sitting at the jewelers on hold till the timing was right to make the announcement. Kristi loved her handsome fiancéso much, feeling so safe and secure when she was in his arms, but yet so nervous when they kissed and petted some. It wasnt that she didnt want or enjoy Marks kisses and touches, it was that Kristi just did not trust herself, wanting to remain a virgin for Mark till their wedding night. Little did Kristi suspect that her movements had been monitored from time to time from the pageant coming to a close, but just in the past three weeks, her every movement had been under the watchful eye of a lusting and deviant rapist. And that last Friday night, when Mark had gotten down on one knee to officially ask for her hand in marriage while at the plush restaurant, this had been viewed from her stalker as he sat at the bar across the way. And upon seeing that she was now officially engaged to be married, the stalking rapist was intent on striking soon! Mark and her parents got along fabulously, with her parents approving of him and expected the two of them to marry eventually, thus getting engaged officially near Christmas of her senior year in college seemed the most appropriate time. That factor, plus being on the Cherry Blossom court required each gal to remain single till the next pageant, thus with Kristi being queen the timing was just right with the next pageant now only months away. Also, atop of her hairdo was the crown she had won, very elegant and quite befitting of her queen title. Damn this is even better .jeez, shed fuckn beautiful! he thought. Slandering up into the hotels lobby, he then looked about for a board showing the various events.
